thread.title: Teen Wolf’s Cody Christian “mortified” and “furious” after explicit video leak
thread.title_full: Teen Wolf’s Cody Christian “mortified” and “furious” after explicit video leak

author: Derek de Koff
title: Teen Wolf’s Cody Christian “mortified” and “furious” after explicit video leak
text:
The world we live is a frightening place in which explicit footage of our favorite male celebs hits the Internet roughly every two hours, and it becomes a full-time job to keep up with all the salacious scandalousness.
Related: Another Day, Another D-List Male Reality Star With A Video Leak 
The most recent example: Teen Wolf ‘s Cody Christian is reportedly “mortified” and “furious” ever since footage surfaced featuring him nude and very much feeling the moment, as Hollywood Life reports.
Widely circulating on tube sites like MyVidster.com, the video leaked online on January 14th, leading the actor to feel like a victim of “betrayal.”
“He’s absolutely mortified, embarrassed, and furious over the video leak,” a shadowy source tells Hollywood Life. (Who are these people?) “To say he is pissed would not even begin to do justice to the level of his anger right now. But the main feeling he’s experiencing is humiliation. He seriously can’t believe this has happened to him — he never in a million years thought he would fall victim to a betrayal like this, and he feels violated.”
Related: This Week In Leaks: America’s Next Top Model’ Contestant Dustin McNeer Has Something To Show You 
The mysterious, motormouthed source has even more to say: “Cody doesn’t even want to leave the house or answer the phone, let alone think about heading back to work.”
Meanwhile, fans are apparently standing in solidarity with the actor and refusing to watch — or, at the very least, stridently lying about refusing to watch.
A hashtag has even popped up — #WeRespectYouCody — which we’re not sure is doing anything to salve his humiliation. And, erm, wait… this just in: Apparently, Teen Wolf ‘s Tyler Posey has also just had his nude photo leaks, so there’s also the hashtag #WeRespectYouTyler.
This wrinkle has caught us completely off-guard, so let us grapple with it together for a moment.

So. Now a good chunk of the cast of Teen Wolf has been caught with their pants down, and here’s a taste of what Twitter has to say about it:
They don't deserve it. We respect you guys, and we are with you always. #werespectyoutyler #werespectyoucody pic.twitter.com/WZqXTrnp7n 
— Teen Wolf Help (@helpteenwolf) January 15, 2017 

TYLER AND CODY DESERVE SO MUCH LOVE AND HAPPINESS AND SUPPORT? #WeRespectYouCody #WeRespectYouTyler pic.twitter.com/z9y5lTqBKx 
— Shipper Heart (@JarunaStilinsk3) January 15, 2017 

Neither of them deserve this!!! ? #WeRespectYouTyler #WeRespectYouCody pic.twitter.com/KjOYsrODVW 
— Stiles O'Brien (@Greenskys123) January 16, 2017 

#werespectyoutyler #werespectyoucody when will people learn privacy? This is so rude and childish. pic.twitter.com/GYXYzH2OnY 
— cas (@pocketlawley) January 16, 2017 

In conclusion: Life is so strange.


’“”“”
